body.p:
To Hon B. Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky:

The undersigned Citizens of Madison County respectfully recommend to your Excellency the appointment of George W: Ballew as Justice of the Peace in District No 5 in this County to fill the vacancy occasioned by the removal of Irvine A. Hunter, late Justice, from -- said District --

Mr Ballew was formerly a Magistrate in said District & discharged his duties with satisfaction to the people -- He is a man of high character & standing and his appointment would meet the approval of the people of the District -- April 18th 1862

J W. Crooke
J. S. Walker
H H Gibson
J W Bourne
James H. Embry
C C Ball
G E Billingsly
S K Turner
W K Weeks
Tho. H. Barnes
C. F. Burnam
Wm. L. Neale
J. W Caperton
P P Ballard
Owen W. Walker
Joshua D Park
Brutus Crooke
